answers.answer: For the hands, a quick test to see if you have diabetes seems appropriate.I have such a tingling in one hand and I also have diabetes.

question: Feels like a quick zap under the skin that itches last for just a second.. Appears in all places on body.  Have bumps on back of scalp (do not itch) but get a scab on them and they also come and go.  Have been checked for Vit. B-12 & D.  but those are alright.  Been using Selsun Blue shampoo for 2 weeks ---bumps still occurring.  Hands fall alseep (my best way to expalin) while driving or chopping food....sometimes wake up with hands alseep.  The tingling -itching is so upsetting to me...When I get them no matter where I am I say "Ouch" they are just so sharp and when I rub them they go from that area.  It does not happen everyday  but it is happening more often and scareingme.  Any ideas?
title: General Help
